title: First Of May
lyrics: When I was small and Christmas trees were tall We used to love while others used to play Don't ask me why, but time has passed us by Someone else moved in from far away Now we are tall and Christmas trees are small And you don't ask the time of day But you and I, our love will never die But guess who'll cry 1:come First of 1: (band enters May When I was small and Christmas trees were tall Do-do-do-do-do do-do-do do-do Don't ask Someone me else why moved but in time from has far passed away us by
